pros: Multiple hooks, shelves, loops, and drawers to hold your entire jewelry collection
Also comes with security lock and LED lights

website_summaries.verdict: Smart space-saving design option, as it may hang over a door. Includes a full length mirror.
pros: Huge amount of storage area for jewelry with multiple shelves, rods, and drawers
Can be mounted on the wall or hung over a door to save wall space
Includes auto on/off LEDs so you can see your stored jewelry clearly
cons: Door doesn't stay closed securely if you overload it

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Loved it, now I have ALL my jewerly in one place! Highly recommend this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Private

customer_reviews.title: I wish I never bought it .
customer_reviews.text: Not made deep enough to shut closed w/necklaces and bracelets on door. . A miserable purchase .
customer_reviews.author: ReCycle♻️Yesterday

customer_reviews.title: This is probably the best purchase I have ever made on amazon
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the best purchase I have ever made on amazon. This is very well made. Like incredibly well made. It stores soon much stuff!!! My daughter loved it and now I am eyeing on for myself. My daughter had jewelry and trinkets everywhere in her room. This put everything neatly in one space. It's elegant and well made. Mirror + jewelry holder = game changer. Highly recommend. We included a video. My daughter wanted to do a product review like the "kids on youtube" :)
customer_reviews.author: Linnette

customer_reviews.title: POOR QUALITY CONTROL
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived and looked fine. However, upon closer inspection, prior to even filling the cabinet with jewelry, the paint CHIPPED IN LARGE SHEETS in multiple locations on the inside. So unacceptable for a $100+ item.
customer_reviews.author: xo

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Close with any chains hanging or bracelets on the bracelet bar!
customer_reviews.text: SOOO dissapointed--read good reviews but sadly this jewelry armoire fails. It looked very nice seeing my necklaces,and bracelets visable before me, but the door won't close with anything hanging. Maybe the necklaces are too bulky but the depth of this cabinet can only accommodate thin chains. Also no place for stud earrings. the tiny little drawers at the bottom are exactly that..tiny ,little drawers. I don't know what you could use them for. Unfortunately, this was hung up as a surprise for me and the return box and info were thrown out.
customer_reviews.author: sue a

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I love it! I love it! It fits all my jewelry and keep them protected from scratches and dust. The light inside is perfect and the ring holders are fantastic. I wish the space between the earrings rows were bigger because of my oversized earrings, but I managed to fit them anyway which is a challenge in any jewelry box or organizer.
customer_reviews.author: Valeria CaraDonna

customer_reviews.title: Cabinet doesn't stay closed.
customer_reviews.text: Latch does not work and the cabinet will not stay closed. I have this on my bedroom door and everytime I open my door, it flys open. The storage on the inside is great and I like the light, but the aforementioned taints the whole purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Slimfine

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Before I had all my jewelry in a Jewelry box and it was timeconsuming to find something to wear I was looking for something so I can see all my Jewelry aaaand FINALY I got it😍now I can see everything right away. Yes, I am a jewelry lover and I love it!!! there is a lot of space, and its so organized...❤️❤️❤️
customer_reviews.author: Sofia

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this mirror twice😕 It was delivered broken both ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this mirror twice😕 It was delivered broken both times... Will not be ordering again
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Poor Design
customer_reviews.text: The jewelry cabinet looks like a wonderful solution but the design should be deeper to accommodate when you actually put jewelry inside it. Very difficult to close once jewelry is inside. I purchased 2, one for myself and one for my daughter. The magnet that holds it closed is not in the right place on her's so it doesn't close at all. This is not good considering it is hung on a door and the jewelry cabinet swings open every time you open or close the bedroom door. Also having the door not fully closed drains the battery. So not impressed with design. It needs to go back to the drawing board.
customer_reviews.author: Fancy_Pants

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: I really like this jewelry organizer but it’s missing some parts. It arrived missing the hooks that go over the door. Part B 2x
customer_reviews.author: Leticia Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I love love loved this idea but the execution is nonsensical. If you plan to put any amount of jewelry in this, do not waste your money. If you put ANYTHING in the door, you cannot close the door even a little bit and it just swings right open. To me, this would suit a child but for a grown adult who has necklaces other than just thin chains it does not work whatsoever. Too small and not deep enough to hold much. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Kyndall D. Raydon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. Bought and cut foam ring inserts for my stud earrings!!
customer_reviews.text: Ahhh it's perfect. I wear a lot of studs so I bought a black foam ring insert and cut it to fit and it looks like it came with the product it is so perfect! I don't wear many dangly earrings so I used part of it to hang some chockers. So far I have no complaints. I only had to screw in the things on to hang on the door. I just love this. Thanks for making this product !!
customer_reviews.author: Bianca

customer_reviews.title: The answer to your jewelry storage problems!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product. It's very well organized and easy to use. The plastic does seems little cheap, but easy to overlook because the functionality of the case. I have tried several different kinds of solutions but this is the best. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MF

customer_reviews.title: It came shattered and cracked
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to receive this product and it came shattered .. I am so disappointed I waited all day for its delivery
customer_reviews.author: Crunchie Munchie

customer_reviews.title: Love this cabinet
customer_reviews.text: Love this cabinet! Great packaging, easy to hang, and no damage. The double sided tape that comes with it works great for stabilizing the cabinet on the door and it doesn't flip around or bounce off the door. I was a little afraid the my bathroom door wouldn't shut very easily due to the door fitting very close to the door frame. The door shuts without any problems. I did WD-40 the door hinges on the cabinet due to being a bit squeaky. Also be sure to have 3 AAA batteries on hand. The LED lights work without any problem. I will probably be ordering a second one for my daughter!
customer_reviews.author: SueC331

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Super bummed this product was damaged. It looks like hinge was over tightened during assembly. Unfortunately this was not sold by Amazon so not much I can do. Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Ottaviano

customer_reviews.title: Unusable & Zero Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea if this unit has storage capacity but it’s definitely easy to lock since it arrived: A) Locked B) Without Keys C) Without any hardware to hang it on the door I don’t care if it’s a good product. It came without necessary hardware and therefore is utterly unusable. Ridiculous. Update - It’s been almost a week since I contacted the customer service of this company - NO RESPONSE
customer_reviews.author: Chidaabha

customer_reviews.title: Door is warped and pops open
customer_reviews.text: I am a little conflicted about this product. I searched for a very long time for the perfect jewelry box. I finally decided on this one as I loved the light feature. The item arrived timely and holds all of my jewelry nicely, but the magnet which holds the door closed is sub par. The door will pop open anytime I close the door it is hung from. Also, the door is warped and does not close flush at the top and bottom, which might be why it pops open all the time. Maybe I just got a lemon, but these two big issues leave me underwhelmed with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Marie

customer_reviews.title: I love it in general
customer_reviews.text: I love it in general. Looks contemporary and clean and assembly was easy. All I had to do was install over the door hooks. Only thing I wish was differentabout it- is about half an inch more space inside . I have tons of bulky necklaces and sadly I can't store them in it:(
customer_reviews.author: DianaT

customer_reviews.title: so so quality; lights DOA
customer_reviews.text: Quality is just ok. The slim wooden bars seen on the left would break if you bumped them. The lights were DOA. Sent a request for a new string of lights so I could attempt a repair (my wife was unwilling to return the whole item for the lights). The unit is rather heavy to only have two drywall anchor attachment points. Should I get an answer to my email from seller regarding replacement lights, I will update.
customer_reviews.author: Josh English

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I am usually disappointed with jewelry cases. I truly love this one. It is made so you can put your various types of jewelry in several places. While it is designed to have individual areas for each type of jewelry you can also utilize other areas if you have of a lot one type, hard to explain. The interior light is a nice touch although the battery did not last long. It looks beautiful on my bedroom wall and I use the mirror for a full size dressing mirror. It is very nicely made, sturdy, pretty color. Pretty easy to hang, too. I would definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Watts

customer_reviews.title: Awesome jewelry cabinet!
customer_reviews.text: This came pre-assembled (Yay!) except for the over-the-door brackets, which needed to be installed. They were really easy to install, and it hangs securely on the door. I love the storage space & the light is really useful. Plus it frees up space on my dresser. If I had known I'd like this so much I would have bought it sooner. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Shoreldy

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent choice! Shipping was scheduled for end of September, arrived end of August. Well packed, no chips, scratches or cracks. Quality is pretty good for the price. It hangs neatly on my door until I decide which wall to attach it to. Product is very light in weight. It holds more jewelry than I expected. Ended up using some of the ring spaces as earring holders. Could have used one more shelf to display my full collection of watches but overall, I am extremely satisfied with my purchase. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Chipped paint at first glance
customer_reviews.text: Just opened the box and I can already see that a corner has paint chipping off. I didn't even remove the plastic covering it yet. It's not even worth removing the plastic to look at it any closer. This didn't happen during shipping because the packing foam isn't damaged at all, just the paint on the wood. So either this is so cheaply made that styrofoam can make the paint chip, or it was packaged with this defect. Either way, this was not worth buying and no I have to haul it to my car and drive all the way over to kohls to return it. So frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Russell & Amber Bohlmann

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Jewelry Storage and Mirror
customer_reviews.text: This was a 2019 Christmas present from my son in law for my daughter....she had wanted one for a long time, it is now attached to the inside of their bedroom door. She loves all the different places she can store 'her stuff' and was amazed at all the spaces for her beloved rings and things. It also serves as a posing mirror for my two young grandsons! Does that double duty and it locks! Very pretty mounted on the door, and she loves it because all her beloved jewelry is organized, and it helps shorten the time she spends dressing my grandsons for school in the morning ..thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Bravo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent solution to jewelry box
customer_reviews.text: I like being able to see all my things at once. Long necklaces will have to be double looped. I wish the light was a little brighter as I was forced to hang mine with the door blocking the room light. Also, no knob on the front - so a bit of a nail breaker when you go to open the door. The magnetic catch on mine is so strong, I almost displace the cabinet from the wall, so be sure to anchor securely.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy B.

customer_reviews.title: Not deep enough for statement necklaces.
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is the depth of the cabinet. That being said, I understand that a cabinet that is designed to hang over the back of a door can only be so deep or the door won’t open completely. I own a lot of costume jewelry and many of my necklaces are chunky. Their size keeps the jewelry cabinet from closing shut. I need another 2-3 inches of depth for the cabinet to close properly. Otherwise the jewelry cabinet is great. I don’t have a lot of rings so I use the ring storage for my non-dangly earrings.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mirror Jewelry Box not quite a match
customer_reviews.text: This item is beautiful and easy to assemble. But I take issue with the slots to store your earrings, which don't allow me to hang my earrings because they are too close to one another. I'm still trying to work around this. Also, not all of my necklaces fit - too few hooks. And the two small drawers are practically useless! There's plenty of room for my rings and bracelets.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I love this! It was much heavier than I thought it would be but it hung almost perfectly on my door. The only complaints I have is the smell (paint I'm guessing) and it not closing all the way unless your jewelry is hanging just right. I have it hung from the door and my door doesn't close all the way due to the metal hooks getting caught at the top; could be just how my doorway is constructed. There are several placement screws on the back for the hooks to allow you to adjust how high or low you want it to hang. I also love that it is tucked away neatly behind the door when it's open.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie M

customer_reviews.title: Nice cabinet but too shallow
customer_reviews.text: For the price this is a nice jewelry cabinet, but I wish I'd paid more attention to the depth. My wife has some larger necklaces I guess, and has to press hard when closing the door and lock it every time so it'll stay shut and turn off the light. I also can't imagine anyone having as many rings as you can store in this thing - it could use more necklace storage and less ring storage, but I suppose that's personal preference. It was easy to hang on the wall and nice that it came fully assembled. I just wish it were about 2 inches deeper.
customer_reviews.author: IIIBradIII

customer_reviews.title: Rustic green is amazing and more teal than green!!!
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this product. I noticed no one had posted any pics of the “green” one so I wanted to after I received mine. For anyone that is curious it is a like green with brown accents so it really is more of a teal or seafoam color than an actual green. I got it because these are the colors in our bedroom and it matches perfectly so glad I took the chance. Hope others will too because it’s beautiful (FYI ours walls are gray in the pics).
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Long

customer_reviews.title: I really like it!
customer_reviews.text: I've only had it for one day, but I really like it so far. It was easy to put together and it holds a TON of jewelry! I like how it makes everything so easy to see. I always end up wearing the same jewelry every day because I don't feel like hunting through it. This spreads it all out in front of me like a jewelry store! I probably didn't need to spring for the lights. They're cute but they don't really do anything, unless you actually put on your jewelry in the pitch darkness. There's not enough room for really long necklaces either. But overall, it is what I hoped for!
customer_reviews.author: fireflycat

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous & Convenient
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! It looks high-end without the high-end price tag. I don’t have many rings so I use that section to organize my most used studs & I love that! The only downfall is that if you have a lot of chunky necklaces, you’re out of luck if you want to close it. It’d be nice if it was slightly deeper to resolve that issue. Honestly, it really doesn’t bother me much, I’m just happy to have all my jewelry organized & easy to see it all to chose from for the day!
customer_reviews.author: VV0620

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this back in February 2020 I have zero regrets!!! This is the absolutely best product you could ever buy for organizing your jewelry don't hesitate just buy this! I never realized how much jewelry I actually own until I started organizing and sorting through everything into this case!! Fast shipping absolutely beautiful case for over the door storage a real space saver!! I should have gotten this sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Frances.J.O.M

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: Believe it or not, this item has changed my life. I was always opening small boxes and jewelry pouches every morning as I was getting dressed in the morning. Now, I just open my closet door and open the armoire door and all my accessories are right there in front of me. I feel so organized! I opted to simply hang it over the closet door rather than mount it and the process could not have been easier.
customer_reviews.author: Designlady

customer_reviews.title: Mirror Door Jewelry Cabinet Organizes Precious Jewelry
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect way to organize your jewelry. Slots for rings, hooks for necklaces, arms for bracelets. On the bottom two drawers for important papers or odds & ends. A couple of design suggestions:1)move the bracelet bar to the right side below the necklace hooks. 2) Add an additional bracelet bar. 3) Remove two shelves on right to allow space for two bracelet bars. 4)By moving the bracelet bar to the right side, there can be more space on the left side between the two rows of necklace hooks allowing for longer necklaces. This cabinet is a real WINNER!!!
customer_reviews.author: redapple

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Buy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my daughter's Dorm Room. Great space saver and easy to use. NO assembly required except screwing in the hanging hooks on back with a Phillips screwdriver and adding 2 AA batteries for light (light has on/off switch on top; but, also has a sensor button inside which turns on/off when opened and closed like a refrigerator). Comes with Molly bolts to hang on the wall and adhesive pads (x2) for bottom back to ensure the cabinet door is secure when opening. Great quality for the price and nice storage capability for jewelry or other items. Perfect buy!
customer_reviews.author: Super Shopper

customer_reviews.title: This is NOT a "full-length" mirror
customer_reviews.text: Although it's not a full length mirror, I like it ALOT for the amount of items it holds. I mention the mirror because since it IS an over-the-door hanger, it isn't as long as a full length door mirror is, and you can't see your ALL in it. However, it is very handy anyways. I love the compartments, the hanging section, the ring section and the velvet it's lined with. I just have one problem with the earring holder section. It's hard to hang studded earrings on it. And if you happen to accidentally bump it, things fall/shift, etc. But all-in-all, I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: It is well made just need to buy not deep enough .
customer_reviews.text: Great product and arrived quick. It was not big enough to hold all my jewelry and the door doesn’t close because the jewelry hanging seem too bulky to close. It need an extra inch or two in depth. The door cannot close with jewelry hanging because there is no room in between. I read the review and several customer reports this flaw but manufacturer is not listening . Too bad because I would repurchase if the design is redone. It’s a good product with that flaw.
customer_reviews.author: Heather A

customer_reviews.title: Nice mirror addition to a room
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent quality product. I don’t know how to hang/display my stud earrings or those that don’t have a wire through the ear lobe. There were no instructions included (for that). Peoples fingers are too small to hook the earring into the tiny holes placed in the earring compartment, so many of my earrings are not able to be displayed - which was disappointing. The ring display is the best part of this cabinet for me. This was hung on a wall & the light feature is very nice for nighttime use. It is heavy which made this impossible for me to even lift inside my house.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy S

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing for the money! I looked at probably 30 different ones trying to find one that was nice, not too expensive, with lots of space for rings and earrings and this one was the best one especially since it came with a coupon. The only thing I wish it had more earring spots lol I have to many earrings.
customer_reviews.author: Tay K

customer_reviews.title: Great cabinet, tricky to hang due to pre-drilled holes not being level
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this cabinet to hold my huge collection of jewelry and costume accessories that were all over the place. It's perfect in terms of it's utility, and I especially love the LED light and lock. It was a bit of a pain to hang however, the holes on the back were not perfectly placed and I had to make modifications to get the cabinet to hang level. With slightly better quality control on the fabrication this product would be perfect. My advice- if you need to hang it with screws, measure everything twice before drilling and do not assume the pre-drilled holes are level.
customer_reviews.author: Ericka James

customer_reviews.title: I am really glad I found this cabinet
customer_reviews.text: I am really glad I found this cabinet. I only had a 4-inch space to hang some kind of jewelry storage, and a huge jewelry collection to store away (just downsized from a 10 room house into a small apartment). I can't get quite everything in but it holds a lot, and has a variety of holding options for different types of jewelry: necklaces, earrings, rings, bracelets. Even scarves if you want. I screwed it to the wall in my walk-in closet, but it could just as well have been attached to the back of a door, or behind a door. There's also long mirror on the cabinet door: a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Jongoma2

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in mint condition and I LOVE it!!
customer_reviews.text: There are so many mixed reviews that I was nervous buying this jewelry cabinet but mine came in mint condition and wow you can pack it with a ton of jewelry! Yes, I will admit there was a smell that wasn't so nice on the inside when it arrived but I sprayed it with my favorite perfume and its perfect! The light is also super cute! I could use about 3 more of these! :-)
customer_reviews.author: Sky

customer_reviews.title: love this mirror
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my walk in closet to hang on the back of the door. not only gives me a full length mirror to check outfits but LOVE all the storage for accessories. Light is a nice touch. Super simple to screw the hardware to mirror (to hang on door). Mirror does not distort image. Mirror seems heavy enough that I did not use the sticky tabs that came with purchase. It does not seem to move when opening / closing door (I suppose it would if one was not in a hurry and really swung door), however, with daily normal use it hasn't moved. One of my favorite purchases on amazon!
customer_reviews.author: ingrid d aberle

customer_reviews.title: True to its description
customer_reviews.text: Did a lot of research on these and after finally determining which one to get, we were left with the color. As we have walnut hardwood floors, we thought the dark brown would be best. But we were so worried about those who compared it to red mahogany. Even other pictures made us worry. But we got it and we're pleasantly surprised to indeed find a "dark brown" cabinet! Best use of space with shelves and cubbies for odd bracelets and watches, plenty of hanging space. LED light is a bonus...perfect for dark mornings when I get to sleep in while my beautiful wife heads in early!
customer_reviews.author: Lee-Bo

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE, LOVE, LOVE my Jewelry Armoire. I had three jewelry boxes before I got the armoire. Everything fits and there is still room for more. I had it over my bedroom door, but my husband decided it would work better on the wall of our closet. Love it!! The only draw back I have is putting the post earrings where they belong. It's a little hard getting my fingers behind the hole to put a clasp on the earring. Other than that....WONDERFUL!!!
customer_reviews.author: purpleindian

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed, but mirror is bent
customer_reviews.text: I'm very impressed with the product and the idea of it. The mounting of it on our wall really required some skill and muscle, and a drill though. Disappointed to find out the mirror has a flaw. About 1" of the mirror on the left side, full length, seems bent in some way that makes it look like a fun house mirror, the view is distorted there. Most of mirror is fine, but it always noticeable. Trying to connect with seller on this.
customer_reviews.author: dingflofbips

customer_reviews.title: I really liked this cabinet
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this in hope to gain space. I really liked this cabinet. I set it up and as i started to add my jewelry I was more in love with it, but then when i finished it would not close. if you have bulky jewelry and not much, then this will work. But if you have think glam, gemstone bracelets, cuffs etc. it will not work for you because the door will not close and it will swing open. Overall for someone with simple thing then I highly recommend. Unfortunately it did not work for me I had to return, but the quality, the LED lighting, the packaging, was perfect. I had no issues with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jorman Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Just Buy it! You Will LOVE IT! Saves SO MUCH SPACE and holds tons of jewelry!!
customer_reviews.text: OMG I can't believe how amazing this is. I had a HUGE exposed jewelry wall at my place, now moving in with my fiancé and needed something less conspicuous. Our house int he city is small, so this makes me look like an organized space-saving PRO! The shelves make is LUXURIOUS!! Just buy it, you won't regret it, We have a luxury home and it looks great. I especially love the locking feature to keep housecleaners and guests out of my jewelry stash! The only thing that doesn't fit is my bangles, which I placed in my vanity drawers.
customer_reviews.author: Happy

customer_reviews.title: Nice concept, few flaws.
customer_reviews.text: It was just what I needed to organize all of my jewelry without taking up shelf space or table space. I mounted it and it doubled nicely as a long mirror although I have a lot of bracelets and if you put anything remotely bulky like a bracelet near the hinges it won't close at all. that is a huge downfall because I have to push it closed and lock it to keep it close which I'm sure is not good for my jewelry.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Organized!
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty nice jewelry cabinet, sturdy and easy to clean. I found the earring holder to be a little difficult to use, post earrings won’t stay in the slits without a back, but the back has to be at the very end of the post in order for post to fit in slot. The drawers are so very small that they’re not super useful and the lock is tricky. Overall, I really like the efficiency, size and ease of viewing what used to be a tangled mess in a drawer. My earrings, brace,ets and necklaces are easy to see and access. I recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: ANNE GRASSER

customer_reviews.title: Heavy - needs bracket to wall mount
customer_reviews.text: Love it but it didn’t hang on the wall as advertised with the hanging equipment provided. Had to go and get a large metal bracket to attach to the wall. That’s whh I can’t score it higher. Otherwise I love the design and the functionality of this piece. I had a traditional cabinet before and couldn’t see any of my jewelry. Now it feels like I have 10 times as much simply because I can see everything and choose something different every day. Get the wall mount bracket from a hardware store and it will be secure attached to the wall. Well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Storage smart with different uses!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! It was easy to put together and put up. It has a ton of places to put all your jewelry. I have so much jewelry, I had filled multiple jewelry boxes, but this thing makes my collection look small! I also love the mirror on the front since I can accessorize and do my makeup and NOT hog the bathroom in the morning. (My husband likes it for this reason too!) This is definitely a must-buy for someone who is limited on space, but loves jewelry! The only issue I have about it is the "new smell" is strong, but it's not bad enough to take a star off as it has weakened since I've gotten it.
customer_reviews.author: Belle

customer_reviews.title: It holds most of my jewelry beautifully
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I have to say about this is that it isnt deep enough. If I had another inch or 2 it would be absolutely perfect but as it is, I cant hang some of my bulkier necklaces in it because I cant shut it. Other than that I LOVE IT!!!! All my jewelry is in one spot and displayed beautifully. The lights are amazing and really do help and also they kind of showcase everything. All in all I love this and will be buying another one as a gift soon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super functional and cute.
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t finished organizing my jewelry but so far so good. There was pretty much nothing to assemble. Screwed the over-the-door hooks and put some batteries, and it was ready to go. It is hard to put studs on the holes, because is tricky to reach on the back to put the stopper. Other than that, I loooove it! And the fact that is white like the door, makes it pretty much disappear on the door. You jus see a mirror. You will need both hands to open it, but I believe that’s so it can hold the weight of all the stuff inside without opening by itself.
customer_reviews.author: FGo

customer_reviews.title: It is decent but missing mark on a few things
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it appeared to be able to organize the amount of jewelry I have so I can see everything but a few things could be easily improved. 1- There is not enough space for me to get my finger behind the "post" earring holes at the top so they are not usable for displaying post earnings. 2- The depth of box need to be deeper as I am limited in bracelet size etc and I couldn't shut the door properly without moving things around. 3- There should be 2 bracelet holders and one less shelf storage.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy

customer_reviews.title: Conveniently placed on my bathroom door
customer_reviews.text: It holds much more jewelry than my floor stand did and everything is visible when I open the door making it easy to choose. My stick pins easily fit in the ring section, and I love the mirror! Now I can see what I look like “all dolled up”! I used the door hangers, and the magnetic latch is so strong it pulls away from the door when I open it. So I put a piece of Velcro on the bottom of the back. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie Tomlinson

customer_reviews.title: I love this and would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing!! I don’t have a ton of jewelry, but this has a hook, a hole, a pocket, a shelf.... for everything. My husband was going to build something like this between two wall studs during our bathroom remodel, but then we found this!!! No more tangled necklaces or lost earrings and it looks great. Love the LED lights that turn on and off automatically when you open or close the door.
customer_reviews.author: Dana S. Helmuth

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Penny!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad I purchased this jewelry cabinet! I chose to hang it on our bedroom door and it displays my jewelry beautifully instead of me digging around in the mornings for certain pieces. The ample shelving also gives me space for perfumes, jewelry boxes, & hair accessories and the led lighting is so helpful. My only wish is that there were more necklace hooks on the left side for longer necklaces. Other than that, I'm very pleased with how easy it was to install and set up.
customer_reviews.author: Mariana

customer_reviews.title: Won’t stay shut
customer_reviews.text: Not a huge fan. I have it hung from the back of my master room door and it won’t stay shut. It hasn’t stayed shut since we purchased it. Gave it a star because the mirror is cool and it does hang from the door and the storage capacity is pretty good. But it’s super annoying to have it swing open all the time. Even just hanging on the door, it won’t shut. So, I might have to glue on some magnets at the top and bottom corners for it to hopefully shut. I don’t know. Kinda disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: cesr

customer_reviews.title: Bulky jewelry is a no-go
customer_reviews.text: This jewelry holder is ok. If you have bulky necklaces, you'll likely have issues finding a way to get the cabinet to close. I had to move the jewelry in the cabinet around multiple times in order to close the door all the way. If it was just an inch deeper, it would work much better. Otherwise, the cabinet can hold a lot of jewelry, and I love the idea. It's taking the place of two separate jewelry holders for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Rawlins

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I looked for a long time for a simply wall mounted unit. I ended up picking this one which was more expensive than others I was looking at that were now sold out. I'm glad I went up in price as I think this one is probably better quality. It is heavy and helps to have a second person to mount on the wall. Holds a lot. I thought there was a section at the top for rings but it was for pins. I will just put a few pins up to hang my rings from...it works great and I love it. Also, it came fully assembled and well packed.
customer_reviews.author: Erin B.

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I've got this chock full of jewelry which I can see now that it's not in a chest so starting wearing jewelry again. I put all the post earrings into the slots where rings go as none of my rings fit me anymore. The only heads up is that the batteries for the lights are on the top outside panel which was a stretch when hung on the door. Not a big problem.
customer_reviews.author: Florida

customer_reviews.title: Mount or hang over door
customer_reviews.text: We didn't have a place to hang this on our wall so we loved the option to hang over a door instead. There were some flaws in the lining (pictured) and it's a little hard to open without a little force - shaking jewelry on a wall is scary sometimes - but it holds everything very well despite the imperfections. Easy to put together and will prove to your man you don't have enough jewelry because of all that extra space.
customer_reviews.author: Patty Valentine

customer_reviews.title: Great jewelry holder and mirror! Better hung on the wall than over a door
customer_reviews.text: I really love this jewelry stand! The bracelet post doesn't fit terribly well and runs into necklaces, which isn't ideal, but there are so many places to put pieces of jewelry, I overall have no complaints! Was easy to hang on the wall. It says it can be hung on a door and comes door hangers, but we tried it on our closet door and decided it didn't hold it sturdy enough - this is a long, relatively heavily armoire and I don't know how it wouldn't bang around if it was attached to a door. So that's my only word of caution - I think this product definitely works best on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: fhchic05

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding!!! (UPDATE INCLUDED)
customer_reviews.text: This looks even better in person. The quality is great and it even came already assembled, which was a pleasant surprise. This has a massive storage capacity. I have only had it for one day so I'm not sure how it will hold up long term but if I have any issues I will post an update. JUNE 15 UPDATE: This is holding up very well and I still love it. It is well made and has even withstood my children messing with it and banging on the mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Cat, Chris and Family

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I loved all the space I have for my jewelry. I have stud earrings I simply inserted in the ring compartments. You may be able to see I’m the picture attached. The mirror I added is actually a locker mirror I bought at TJ MAXX a while back. I attached a velcro strip to the back of the mirror and attached it. I VERY a happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Babbsi

customer_reviews.title: Best way to organize and display your jewelry!
customer_reviews.text: After wanting a better way to organize and display my jewelry I finally found this product and I am SOOOO Happy with it. I was constantly lugging my best jewelry to the gun safe every time we left for vacation and now I can rest assured that its locked safe and sound in this secret Mirror storage. The storage options were bigger in person than I expected. I told my husband he's going to need to buy me more to fill all the slots haha! It was very easy to install, we hung it on the wall but it also came with over the door hook assembly.. I would highly recommend this! Great value and great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel T.

customer_reviews.title: A quality product that is very attractive.
customer_reviews.text: This jewelry cabinet is very attractive and well made. I have been looking for one for a couple of years, but found that many of them have cheaply made interiors that don't look like they would hold up over time. This one is well made and has an LED light inside. I can't believe how much jewelry this cabinet holds. It had some weight to it, so my husband mounted it on the wall instead of over the door. The cabinet has a sturdy closure, so when I open it, I hold it against the wall as I pull the door open. The cabinet comes with a lock and key which is a nice feature.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but.........
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty nice jewelry case, with a nice mirror on the front, but I should have got the one with the slant board for earrings with backs. They are very hard to get on the board without losing the backs in the process. Update- As a token of seller's wish to make me happier with my purchase, I was offered a choice of a lockable jewelry organizer with a stud board or a $25 refund. Very considerate seller that wants you to be happy with your purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn L.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in good condition, better made than expected
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in good condition, better made than expected. Holds a HUGE amount of jewelry, especially rings and earrings. If you have many bulky necklaces, they may not fit since the door may not shut. Not much room for bracelets and those you do put on the bar, need to be flexible or again, the door may not shut. But there's plenty of room on the shelves for more bracelets or watches. It would be nice if it was an inch deeper but it's hard to complain for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D. Cohee

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this spacesaver
customer_reviews.text: Yes, it does have a terrible interior smell at first, but it can aired out. It looks great and the storage part is barely noticeable. The light is a nice feature too. However, I have had to move some of the holders. If I loaded up the bracelet arm, it would collide with my necklaces inside. I think it would be fabulous if you could reconfigure it for your jewelry, but it's still pretty cool. I think it's a decent value. It helped me organize my bedroom which had too much stuff sitting on my countertops.
customer_reviews.author: foggybreeze

customer_reviews.title: It works fine. Lights up.
customer_reviews.text: As I decided to hang mine over a door, I can not attest to whether or not it would do well attached to a wall. I wish it had more bars for bracelets, but it would be difficult to fit everything needed in the cabinet without making it bigger. You can see in the picture which version I got. Also, you can fit stud earrings in the loop earring slots. Just open the earring slightly and then push it onto the slot. You can turn the light feature off so that it doesn’t turn on when you open the door.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Kay

customer_reviews.title: Get organized in no time at all!
customer_reviews.text: What a great way to sort all of my wife’s jewelry! Lots of compartments, big spaces, many ways to sort, and a true space savor when hung on the door. It only took seconds to assemble and is a sturdy well built piece. It has so much room that my wife now sees jewelry she forgot she even had! I highly recommend this for those that need to get their accessories under control.
customer_reviews.author: Sohala

customer_reviews.title: Not meant for bigger jewelry
customer_reviews.text: Was so excited to order this. Then was quickly disappointed when I started putting all my jewelry in. If I attach bracelets to the bracelet holders the door won't shut. So I moved the necklaces to where the bracelets would go and I had the same problem. Finally just got everything in after moving a ton of stuff around and the door was still difficult to shut. I wish this was a few inches deeper to prevent this problem. The customer service I recieved from them was amazing and I think they took my ideas into consideration.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie C

customer_reviews.title: Love my jewelry cabinet!
customer_reviews.text: Love my jewelry cabinet. It has lots of space. Seems to be built well. Only real complaint is the ear ring section. I might need to change it. The necklace hooks are not quite long enough for an 18” length before the next row. So I’m afraid they will get tangled. There is only one bar for bracelets. I’m sure I can work something out. Only jewelry box I’ve ever had that was big enough. Love my jewelry!!
customer_reviews.author: Honey

customer_reviews.title: Totally useless
customer_reviews.text: Great looking jewelry armoire that I thought had solved my jewelry storage problems until I tried to close the door. If you hang anything other than a couple very thin chain necklaces the door will not close. Bracelets, forget about those too. Great idea but it's made way too shallow. What a disappointment
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer canady

customer_reviews.title: No complaints!
customer_reviews.text: Love this jewelry cabinet! Have been using this for 6 months or so now and it’s perfect to keep everything visible and organized. I agree with the reviewer about the earring storage in the door and her fix sounds like a good idea. I don’t have that many earrings so I haven’t personally done it but a good DIY project for the future when I have time. Very satisfied with this choice!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: This cabinet has many more features than other like products. I installed it into the wall between ...
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with the overall quality especially for the price. This cabinet has many more features than other like products. I installed it into the wall between the studs so it just looks like a mirror hanging on the wall. Note if installed IN the wall you can no longer use the lock since the key hole is no longer assessable (I still prefer having it built in as "hidden jewelry cabinet"). Only reason not 5 stars is the bottom right corner of the door is slightly warped. :(
customer_reviews.author: B. Farrell

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife to hang on the door for space saving use. It is big enough for sure, has a nice display platform for all types of jewelry and other items as well and is easy on the eyes. Plus it doubles as a full length mirror which is very nice and convenient. The key feature is great, but only keeps an honest person honest....it is good enough for most jewelry collections. But let's be real; if a piece of jewelry is worth a bunch of money then you would be looking up safes...right? Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Brad S.

customer_reviews.title: Large space inside allows a variety of options for different jewelry storage. Well made. Beautiful!  Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Amazon is wonderful as well as this product. Came 2 days earlier than first stated. Product was well packaged, assuring no damage. Well built and lots of room for jewelry. Easy to attach hooks, also came with screws to put on wall. Wish it had been slightly taller, need more room for all my junk jewelry, but the mirror shows my full body, a concern since I am short and my bedroom door is taller than most. Wish I had more available doors for another of this cabinet. Did have a slight smell when first opened. Gone now, not noticed this first week since opening.
customer_reviews.author: Vianne

customer_reviews.title: I love all the space for my jewelry
customer_reviews.text: This is very handsomely designed, I love all the space for my jewelry, the lock, and the light. I can't decide how much I like the smell of the factory-fresh jewelry box or if I even like it. It's interesting though. I do think I like it. It's noteworthy. It's easy to assemble so if your husband gets you a last minute Valentine's Day gift but leaves it in the living for two weeks, ladies you can easily put this together, you'll get the full smell effects. The packaging is nice, and they wrap a thick board over the mirror so it doesn't break.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole S

customer_reviews.title: Love the auto light and the lock systems
customer_reviews.text: Installation process was straight-forward with wall mounting. Love the auto light and the lock systems. Variety of compartment sizes works well. But then, you try to put earrings in the slotted boards and no-way will you get the backing on a stud earring behind there! You can only use the slats for dangle earrings. Would have been a much better design if the slats were hinged on one side, allowing them to open and shut! So I ended up using some of the rings spaces for earrings. Overall, I love that I can see what I have at a glance and use the mirror to check the whole outfit.
customer_reviews.author: viggal

customer_reviews.title: Maybe the best purchase I've ever made
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE jewelry, and have a lot of both nice and costume pieces. Prior to buying this cabinet, most was kept in a variety of jewelry boxes and just plain boxes. As a result, I would forget what I had. Now all I have to do is open the door, and everything is in plain sight. One of my sons saw it and ordered one for his wife while he was standing there. So glad I found this cabinet!
customer_reviews.author: RayL.

customer_reviews.title: ... want just get it the jewelry owner will be happy. I mounted it directly to the wall with ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the one you want just get it the jewelry owner will be happy. I mounted it directly to the wall with some drywall anchors for my wife. Best V-Day gift she is very happy and she shows all of her friends. You have lots of space and can hang all types of necklaces, earrings etc. Only reasons it is not a perfect 5 star. To hang it you need to pull out the foam at the top to drill in some screws. When done since you ripped out the glue you have to glue it back in yourself. Be a little handy when putting this thing up but it will hold up for a while I can tell.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Bell

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with product!
customer_reviews.text: I never write reviews, but I am so happy with this purchase that I decided that I should. They shipped it to my US Military address overseas; it arrived in perfect condition. It was super simple to hang and install batteries, and it holds 40 years worth of jewelry very nicely. I’ve finally opened and emptied all the old jewelry boxes or plastic boxes my stuff was stored in, and I can finally see what I have. Now I’m determined that if I don’t wear something within this year, I’m getting rid of it. It feels good to get organized!
customer_reviews.author: B. Hertz

customer_reviews.title: Really cool
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the space I have. I wanted it mounted in at least one stud which dictated its placement, but I actually like how close it is to the door because I can still easily open it but it’s not so obvious that it’s a storage mirror. My husband thought it was cool too and wanted to add his necklaces lol
customer_reviews.author: Christi

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Alternative to Expensive and Bulky Jewelry Boxes
customer_reviews.text: I looked hard and long for an over the door jewelry armoire and settled on this one for several reasons -- it had plenty of hooks, spaces, shelves, etc. for jewelry and it had an internal light. When I got this it was very easy to put together, so no problems there. I wanted one which matched my walls and door, so I painted it to match them and it came out great. My only issue is that my necklaces are quite thick and depending on where I place them I have some issues closing the door. I have worked around that by placing things on hooks that won't interfere. All-in-all a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Jewelry keeper
customer_reviews.text: Got for my daughter for Christmas. Opened when it arrived to be sure not broken. Good quality. Closes well, mirror is a real mirror, not a warped fake. Like that it locks. Like that it fits over a door with hooks so installation is easy. it holds lots of jewelry. Daughter loves it. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Anderson

customer_reviews.title: wife loves it.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for our bedroom. My wife loves it. She has a place to organize all of her jewelry, she can hang all of her necklaces and earrings in one place as well. I think her favorite part is that there is so much room, I can put my stuff in there with hers instead of leaving my wedding ring just sitting on a sink or counter. Get this as a gift for your other half, they will love it. Trust me. No assembly, just hang on wall. Lots of space, easy to lock, there's a light inside.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Morris

customer_reviews.title: A few things to know before you buy
customer_reviews.text: So it looks great and it’s not a bad buy but just a few things I didn’t realize. I purchased the white box and there wholes to put stuff earrings but it’s rrally difficult to get them in. Also hard bangles cannot go on the long white rod on the left side because then the mirror doesn’t close. You have to use it for soft bendable bracelets. So any cuffs or hard non bendable bracelets have to go on the other side or they might not even fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's good, but I was surprised that there is no ...
customer_reviews.text: It's good, but I was surprised that there is no ring storage. My larger necklaces also dangle and prevent it from closing because they are blocked by shelves. If you plan to use it over a door that you actually open and close, just hanging it won't be enough. It will swing. You will need to attach it with screws or something else as well.
customer_reviews.author: Dierdre L Kelleher

customer_reviews.title: Makes organizing a snap - vertical is the way to go.
customer_reviews.text: I hung this over a door that I never close so it works great. At first I hung it over another door but it kept banging against the door when I would close it so I had to move it. It stores all my jewelry in an organized area and the lighting is a big plus to help see in the morning. I had a jewelry box on my bureau but I tended to put clothes or hair stuff on top of it so it was always hard to get to my jewelry. Now I have easy access and the mirror is a plus because it almost gives you a full length view.
customer_reviews.author: LMBaltimore

customer_reviews.title: It’s perfect and the quality is great
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my best gifts from my husband. It is perfect. Such a great way to be organized.
customer_reviews.author: Aisha Dewar

customer_reviews.title: I love this jewelry case and the mirror
customer_reviews.text: I love this jewelry case and the mirror. I mounted to a wall. I used larger screws than what was sent because the ones that came with it just seemed so small. The earring holders suck like everyone else has said but I am going to try the picture frame hinge idea one of the other reviewers recommended. Also, it has that terrible chemical smell in the inside. I'm going to by some febreeze and leave open for a few days to try to get it out
customer_reviews.author: Loraligrrl

customer_reviews.title: A great jewelry wall-mounted jewelry cabinet.
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this jewelry cabinet for several years and I love it. I especially like the mirror that allows me to immediately see how the jewelry looks with my clothes. I bought this cabinet for my 15 year old granddaughter for Chistmas and she loves it, too. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great concept, some quirks
customer_reviews.text: Really like the concept. Not as much room for non jewerly items, i.e. little mementos. Also rhe bracelet bar is located in a spot to hinder being able to shut the box itself. Only works for flexeble bracets that can "squish", bangles are a no. Wish there were more necklace spots. Like the concept, could see switching it out somewhere down the line for a better executed design.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value, holds a lot of jewelry!
customer_reviews.text: My husband got this for me for Christmas. It’s perfect! I hung it over or closet door. It holds earrings, rings, bracelets, necklaces, and a ton of the miscellaneous things that clutter up your area. I love the light that comes on when you open it since our room doesn’t have great lighting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: SONGMICS 6 LEDs Mirror Jewelry Cabinet, 47.3"H Lockable Wall/Door Mounted Jewelry Armoire Organizer with Mirror, 2 Drawers, Pure White UJJC93W
feature_bullets: SPECIALIZED JEWELRY CABINET: You deserve a better constructed jewelry cabinet for long time use from SONGMICS. Other cheap full screen mirrored door is super easy to be distorted after a few weeks and attach fingerprints every time use it. Also, the stick-on off-white wood grain veneer is low-cost & flawed than SONGMICS spray painting processing

AUTO LED LIGHTS CABINET: Cozy blue 6 LED lights helps you easily to choose the right jewelry from cabinet without waking up husband (LED is powered by 3 AAA batteries, not included)；We check every light before delivery to ensure customers' convenience

47.3"H LARGE STORAGE CAPACITY: Keep all your jewelry in one place with 1 large ring cushion, 1 longer bracelet rod, 2 bottom drawers, 5 shelves, 32 necklace hooks, 48 stud earring holes and 90 earring slots; optimal structure increase space utilization rate

REAL GLASS MIRROR: Highly selective glass helps avoid "fun house" effect and provides better performance, the full length mirror with solid MDF frame offers a head-to-toe view of your outfit, without smelly glass glue and avoid distorting

WALL & DOOR MOUNT ARMOIRE: You can mount the jewelry cabinet on the wall with included screws and paper for drilling holes to save floor space; also 3 adjustable heights available when hanging the jewelry organizer over the door with hooks, which will not sway when opening the door

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars4,370 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: SONGMICS Lockable Jewelry Cabinet Wall Door Mounted Jewelry Armoire Organizer with Mirror LED Light, White
